materials_text:
A = Sand — granular micro-noise; low contrast; no long streaks.
B = Water — calm surface; subtle cellular noise; small specular flecks; no outlines.
palette_text:
Use ONLY these colors:
Sand: #F8F4E8,#E2D4B7,#C8A978,#A07844,#D6C9B1,#9A8A78,#6E5A44,#3A2A20
Water: #B8D8E8,#78B0C8,#3C7896,#203850
Accents (foam/wet band): #FFFFFF,#1A0F0D  (sparingly)
interface_text:
Shoreline at every A↔B boundary:
• Foam: 1–2 tile-pixels on the B (water) side with sparse speckles.
• Wet sand: 2–3 tile-pixels on the A side; slightly darker variant of Sand.
• No contour outlines at shoreline; water never has outlines.
